channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Wickes flatbed trolley abandoned, 25th April
item.description:
A Wickes flatbed trolley has been abandoned at the location indicated. It has been there since Friday 22 April. The Wickes store on Tewkesbury Rd was informed on Friday and Wickes customer services were informed on Saturday. Both promised action but the trolley has not been collected.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 217 Mandarin Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of rubbish just dumped on path, 25th April
item.description:
Absolute hazard and an awful mess, this is not a unique problem or the first time. More should be done to tackle this ongoing problem.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Cotswold Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped packaging, 25th April
item.description:
Flytipped packaging in the car park at top of Cleeve hill, - up from Park lane then turn right and follow road along to car park
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Sevenhampton

item.title: Flytipped packaging, 25th April
item.description:
Flytipped packaging, Cleeve common car park (beside West Down), Turn right at the top of Park lane, Brockhampton and at the far end there is a small car park.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Sevenhampton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish all along river Chelt, 25th April
item.description:
Rubbish scattered all along the river Chelt up towards PE Way and in opposite direction towards bridge with large willow tree over it (some kind of trolley in that part of river). Really dangerous for wildlife (there are ducks and ducklings now on river) and will end up in the sea. Public canâ€™t get down to river to safely clear this litter. Please can it be taken asay

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 18 Glynbridge Gardens, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole, 25th April
item.description:
Dangerous pothole, must be at least 150cms deep,and about 600cms long. Been there for a few weeks.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Selfish flytippers, 22nd April
item.description:
